title.isNotEmpty: Event title must not be empty

limit.isNotEmpty: Event limit must not be empty
limit.isInt: Event limit must be an integer

startDate.isNotEmpty: Event start date must not be empty
startDate.isDate: Event start date must be a valid date

endDate.isNotEmpty: Event end date must not be empty
endDate.isDate: Event end date must be a valid date
endDate.isAfter: Event end date must be after start date
